metadata.title: CVE-2023-29542 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A newline in a filename could have been used to bypass the file extensionsecurity mechanisms that replace malicious file extensions such as .lnkwith .download. This could have led to accidental execution of maliciouscode. *This bug only affects Firefox and Thunderbird on Windows. Otherversions of Firefox and Thunderbird are unaffected.* This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 112, Firefox ESR < 102.10, and Thunderbird < 102.10.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
